3 uav_flocking::uav_flocking ()
4 {
5  // read parameters
6  NodeHandle nh;
7  double loop_rate;
8  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/loop_rate", loop_rate, 5.0);
9  dt = 1 / loop_rate;
10  int queue_size;
11  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/queue_size", queue_size, 1);
12  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/equi_dist", equi_dist, 10.0);
13  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/flock_vel", flock_vel, 0.5);
14  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/form_vel", form_vel, 0.5);
15  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/repulse_spring", repulse_spring, 1.0);
16  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/repulse_max", repulse_max, 1.0);
17  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/align_frict", align_frict, 20.0);
18  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/align_slope", align_slope, 1.0);
19  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/align_min", align_min, 1.0);
20  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/wall_frict", wall_frict, 20.0);
21  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/wall_decay", wall_decay, 1.0);
22  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/form_shape", form_shape, 1.0);
23  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/form_track", form_track, 1.0);
24  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/accel_time", accel_time, 1.0);
25 
26  // init subscribers
27  swarm_pose_sub = nh.subscribe("swarm_position_rel", queue_size, &uav_flocking::swarm_pose_callback, this);
28  swarm_vel_sub = nh.subscribe("swarm_velocity_rel", queue_size, &uav_flocking::swarm_vel_callback, this);
29 
30  // init service clients
31  area_client = nh.serviceClient<cpswarm_msgs::GetPoints>("area/get_area");
32  area_client.waitForExistence();
33 
34  // init velocities and acceleration
35  a_repulsion.x = 0;
36  a_repulsion.y = 0;
37  a_repulsion.z = 0;
38  a_alignment.x = 0;
39  a_alignment.y = 0;
40  a_alignment.z = 0;
41  v_flock.x = 0;
42  v_flock.y = 0;
43  v_flock.z = 0;
44  a_wall.x = 0;
45  a_wall.y = 0;
46  a_wall.z = 0;
47  v_formation.x = 0;
48  v_formation.y = 0;
49  v_formation.z = 0;
50 }
51 
52 geometry_msgs::Vector3 uav_flocking::coverage (geometry_msgs::Vector3 velocity)
53 {
54  // compute acceleration from repulsive forces between CPSs
55  repulsion();
56 
57  // compute acceleration to align velocities between CPSs
58  alignment();
59 
60  // compute velocity to move as flock
61  flocking(velocity);
62 
63  // compute acceleration to stay within area
64  wall();
65 
66  // add up individual velocities and accelerations
67  geometry_msgs::Vector3 vel_cur = vel.get_velocity();
68  geometry_msgs::Vector3 vel_new;
69  vel_new.x = vel_cur.x + 1 / accel_time * (v_flock.x - vel_cur.x) * dt + (a_repulsion.x + a_alignment.x + a_wall.x) * dt;
70  vel_new.y = vel_cur.y + 1 / accel_time * (v_flock.y - vel_cur.y) * dt + (a_repulsion.y + a_alignment.y + a_wall.y) * dt;
71 
72  ROS_ERROR("%.2f = cur %.2f + flock %.2f + repulse %.2f + align %.2f + wall %.2f", hypot(vel_new.x, vel_new.y), hypot(vel_cur.x, vel_cur.x), hypot(1 / accel_time * (v_flock.x - vel_cur.x) * dt, 1 / accel_time * (v_flock.y - vel_cur.y)), hypot(a_repulsion.x * dt, a_repulsion.y*dt), hypot(a_alignment.x * dt, a_alignment.y * dt), hypot(a_wall.x * dt, a_wall.y * dt));
73 
74  return vel_new;
75 
76 }
77 
78 geometry_msgs::Vector3 uav_flocking::tracking (geometry_msgs::Pose target)
79 {
80  // compute acceleration from repulsive forces between CPSs
81  repulsion();
82 
83  // compute acceleration to align velocities between CPSs
84  alignment();
85 
86  // compute velocity required to achieve formation
87  formation(target.position);
88 
89  // add up individual velocities and accelerations
90  geometry_msgs::Vector3 vel_cur = vel.get_velocity();
91  geometry_msgs::Vector3 vel_new;
92  vel_new.x = vel_cur.x + 1 / accel_time * (v_formation.x - vel_cur.x) * dt + (a_repulsion.x + a_alignment.x) * dt;
93  vel_new.y = vel_cur.y + 1 / accel_time * (v_formation.y - vel_cur.y) * dt + (a_repulsion.y + a_alignment.y) * dt;
94 
95  return vel_new;
96 }
97 
98 void uav_flocking::alignment ()
99 {
100  // init alignment acceleration
101  a_alignment.x = 0;
102  a_alignment.y = 0;
103 
104  // TODO: fix this term: over excitation of uav!
105 
106  // compute damped velocity differences for all neighbors
107  for (auto pose : swarm_pos) {
108  // compute damping
109  double damp = max(pose.vector.magnitude - (equi_dist - align_slope), align_min);
110  damp *= damp;
111 
112  // get velocity of this neighbor
113  cpswarm_msgs::Vector v = get_velocity(pose.swarmio.node);
114  if (v.magnitude == 0.0 && v.direction == 0.0) // no velocity data found
115  continue;
116 
117  // compute velocity difference
118  double vx = v.magnitude * cos(v.direction);
119  double vy = v.magnitude * sin(v.direction);
120 
121  // sum up damped velocity difference
122  a_alignment.x += vx / damp;
123  a_alignment.y += vy / damp;
124  }
125 
126  // apply friction coefficient
127  a_alignment.x *= align_frict;
128  a_alignment.y *= align_frict;
129 }
130 
131 double uav_flocking::dist_bound()
132 {
133  // get pose
134  geometry_msgs::Pose pose = pos.get_pose();
135 
136  // get area coordinates
137  cpswarm_msgs::GetPoints area;
138  if (area_client.call(area) == false){
139  ROS_ERROR("Failed to get area boundary");
140  return 0.0;
141  }
142 
143  // point where line from origin through pose intersects boundary
144  geometry_msgs::Point p;
145 
146  // distance of point from origin
147  double dist = 0.0;
148 
149  // coordinates of line segment from origin to pose
150  double x1 = 0;
151  double y1 = 0;
152  double x2 = pose.position.x;
153  double y2 = pose.position.y;
154 
155  // find boundary that yields closest intersection point (i.e. the correct boundary)
156  for (int i=0; i<area.response.points.size(); ++i) {
157  // coordinates of boundary
158  double x3 = area.response.points[i].x;
159  double y3 = area.response.points[i].y;
160  double x4 = area.response.points[(i+1) % area.response.points.size()].x;
161  double y4 = area.response.points[(i+1) % area.response.points.size()].y;
162 
163  // compute point based on https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Line%E2%80%93line_intersection#Given_two_points_on_each_line
164  p.x = ((x1*y2 - y1*x2) * (x3 - x4) - (x1 - x2) * (x3*y4 - y3*x4)) / ((x1 - x2) * (y3 - y4) - (y1 - y2) * (x3 - x4));
165  p.y = ((x1*y2 - y1*x2) * (y3 - y4) - (y1 - y2) * (x3*y4 - y3*x4)) / ((x1 - x2) * (y3 - y4) - (y1 - y2) * (x3 - x4));
166 
167  // found closer point
168  if (hypot(p.x, p.y) < dist || dist == 0.0)
169  dist = hypot(p.x, p.y);
170  }
171 
172  // return distance
173  return dist;
174 }
175 
176 void uav_flocking::flocking (geometry_msgs::Vector3 velocity)
177 {
178  // current velocity
179  double vel_mag = hypot(velocity.x, velocity.y);
180 
181  // get pose
182  geometry_msgs::Pose pose = pos.get_pose();
183  double pose_mag = hypot(pose.position.x, pose.position.y);
184 
185  // compute flocking velocity
186  v_flock.x = flock_vel / vel_mag * velocity.x;
187  v_flock.y = flock_vel / vel_mag * velocity.y;
188 }
189 
190 void uav_flocking::formation (geometry_msgs::Point target)
191 {
192  // get pose
193  geometry_msgs::Pose pose = pos.get_pose();
194 
195  // define shape position depending on formation
196  geometry_msgs::Vector3 x_shp;
197  switch (form) {
198  case FORM_GRID:
199  // TODO also define R
200  x_shp.x = 0;
201  x_shp.y = 0;
202  break;
203  case FORM_RING:
204  // TODO
205  x_shp.x = 0;
206  x_shp.y = 0;
207  break;
208  case FORM_LINE:
209  // TODO
210  x_shp.x = 0;
211  x_shp.y = 0;
212  break;
213  default:
214  ROS_FATAL("Unknown flocking formation");
215  return;
216  }
217  double shp_mag = hypot(x_shp.x - pose.position.x, x_shp.y - pose.position.y);
218 
219  // compute shape velocity
220  double tf_shp = transfer(shp_mag, 0, 0); // TODO use R defined above, what about decay?
221  geometry_msgs::Vector3 v_shp;
222  v_shp.x = form_shape * form_vel * tf_shp * (x_shp.x - pose.position.x) / shp_mag;
223  v_shp.y = form_shape * form_vel * tf_shp * (x_shp.y - pose.position.y) / shp_mag;
224 
225  // target position
226  geometry_msgs::Vector3 x_com;
227  x_com.x = target.x;
228  x_com.y = target.y;
229  double trg_mag = hypot(x_com.x, x_com.y);
230 
231  // compute target tracking velocity
232  double tf_track = transfer(trg_mag, 0, 0); // TODO
233  geometry_msgs::Vector3 v_trg;
234  v_trg.x = - form_track * form_vel * tf_track * x_com.x / trg_mag;
235  v_trg.y = - form_track * form_vel * tf_track * x_com.y / trg_mag;
236 
237  // combine velocities
238  v_formation.x = v_shp.x + v_trg.x;
239  v_formation.y = v_shp.y + v_trg.y;
240  double vel_mag = hypot(v_formation.x, v_formation.y);
241  if (vel_mag > form_vel) {
242  v_formation.x *= form_vel / vel_mag;
243  v_formation.y *= form_vel / vel_mag;
244  }
245 }
246 
247 cpswarm_msgs::Vector uav_flocking::get_velocity (string uuid) const
248 {
249  // search for uav with given uuid
250  for (auto vel : swarm_vel) {
251  if (vel.swarmio.node == uuid)
252  return vel.vector;
253  }
254 
255  // return empty vector if uuid is unknown
256  return cpswarm_msgs::Vector();
257 }
258 
259 void uav_flocking::repulsion ()
260 {
261  // init repulsive force acceleration
262  a_repulsion.x = 0;
263  a_repulsion.y = 0;
264 
265  // compute pair potentials for all neighbors
266  for (auto pose : swarm_pos) {
267  // repulsion only from close neighbors
268  if (pose.vector.magnitude < equi_dist) {
269  // compute pair potential
270  double pot = min(repulse_max, equi_dist - pose.vector.magnitude) / pose.vector.magnitude;
271 
272  // sum up potentials
273  a_repulsion.x += pot * pose.vector.magnitude * cos(pose.vector.direction);
274  a_repulsion.y += pot * pose.vector.magnitude * sin(pose.vector.direction);
275  }
276  }
277 
278  // apply spring constant
279  a_repulsion.x *= -repulse_spring;
280  a_repulsion.y *= -repulse_spring;
281 }
282 
283 double uav_flocking::transfer (double x, double r, double d)
284 {
285  if (x <= r) {
286  return 0;
287  }
288  else if (r + d <= x) {
289  return 1;
290  }
291  else {
292  return 0.5 * sin(M_PI / d * (x - r) - M_PI / 2) + 0.5;
293  }
294 }
295 
296 void uav_flocking::wall ()
297 {
298  // get current velocity
299  geometry_msgs::Vector3 velocity = vel.get_velocity();
300 
301  // get pose
302  geometry_msgs::Pose pose = pos.get_pose();
303  double pose_mag = hypot(pose.position.x, pose.position.y);
304 
305  // compute velocity requirement due to bounding area
306  geometry_msgs::Vector3 v_wall;
307  v_wall.x = - flock_vel * pose.position.x / pose_mag - velocity.x;
308  v_wall.y = - flock_vel * pose.position.y / pose_mag - velocity.y;
309 
310  // compute transfer function for smooth movement
311  double tf = transfer(pose_mag, dist_bound()-wall_decay, wall_decay); // subtract decay in order to stay within area bounds
312 
313  // total acceleration due to bounding area
314  a_wall.x = wall_frict * tf * v_wall.x;
315  a_wall.y = wall_frict * tf * v_wall.y;
316 }

320  swarm_pos = msg->vectors;
